mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `platform`, `open_id`, `union_id`, `achievement`, `top_score`, `money`, `registration_date`, `last_login`, `created_at`, `updated_at` FROM doodle_ball_player WHERE platform = #{platform} and openId = #{openId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doodle_ball_player(`platform`, `open_id`, `union_id`, `achievement`, `top_score`, `money`, `registration_date`, `last_login`) VALUES (#{platform}, #{openId}, #{unionId}, #{achievement}, #{topScore}, #{money}, #{registrationDate}, #{lastLogin}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE achievement = #{achievement}, topScore = #{topScore}, money = #{money}, last_login = #{lastLogin}
